product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX & I fell into financial hardship when XXXX lost her job in XXXX. We filed bankruptcy, chapter XXXX in XXXX of XXXX and were discharged in XXXX of XXXX. During this time with XXXX children we could not afford the payment to the trustee [ {$600.00} per month ] and our mortgage. I missed approx. XXXX mortgage payments, however, foreclosure proceeding did not begin or occur at anytime since we were protected by the " automatic stay '' of the bankruptcy law. 

In XXXX of XXXX, Wells Fargo Mortgage approved us for a remodification under the new federal law for FHA loans however charged us exorbitantly high capitalized interest ( noted as " New Money '' on page XXXX ) in the amount of {$46000.00}. To be honest, we were both naively under the impression that our principal balance we remain at {$240000.00}, as it was before our filing of Chapter XXXX in XXXX. 

Since we have XXXX children, keeping our house was most important to us so we accepted the remodification and signed the documents at our local Wells Fargo Branch. We did not know we would get hit this hard in delinquent interest, other unknown fees, and feel Wells gouged us placing us well underwater on our loan. 

We also both feel we should have been offered a better finance rate than 4.25 %. If the " New Money ( Cap ) '' was lower and so was the annual rate this could be potential difference of {$100.00} - {$200.00} per month. Which is a big deal to a family of XXXX in XXXX. 

Thanks you in advance for any help you can provide in this matter. 

Sincerely, XXXX and XXXX XXXX

product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative:
My name is XXXX XXXX and am writing this letter to advise you that I had a mortgage loan with wells fargo. I had been trying for some time to try and work out a loan modification to get caught up on my delinquent loan and bring it current and start making payments. We had gotten approved for a loan modification in XXXX of XXXX and received a package that we notorized and sent back XXXX XXXX, XXXX, Wells fargo advised us on XXXX XXXX, XXXX that they had not received the loan modification paperwork and closed the file out voiding the loan modification they had qualified us for. The next day that we contacted wells fargo, they had notified us that they had just received the signed and notorized loan modification paperwork, but that is was too late to honor the agreement since they had not gotten it on time. we appealed their decision and re-appealed it, yet our request went on deaf ears. We reapplied again for a loan modification, but had a difficult time trying to get the file to underwriting since wells fargo was always requesting information that we sent to them numerous times. 
This went on till XXXX XXXX, XXXX when the were not willing to stop the sale of my home and sold it to foreclosure. Let me mention that we had applied right after the loan modification they had offered us was denied with the same information that we had previously been qualified with, but wells fargo turned us down, because we did n't qualify, yet it was the same information we had previously applied with and been qualified with??? I 'm asking that your organization please intervene and ask wells fargo why our numerous request since XXXX of XXXX went on deaf ears. They never were willing to work with us since that time? I may be contacted at XXXX or XXXX. All I was asking from wells fargo was a fair shake and I felt they never gave us that since XXXX of XXXX. My husband XXXX XXXX passed away in XXXX of XXXX and when we had re-applied in late XXXX of XXXX for a loan modification wells fargo informed us that nothing had changed since their last review in XXXX of XXXX so they were no able to offer us any loan modification workout. I was taken back with this response since my husband had died in XXXX and I faxed them the death certificate proving he had passed. I tried again on XXXX XXXX, XXXX and was told to fax in all the required information again the very next day I was told that the file had been closed, because again nothing had changed since the review of XXXX XXXX and I had exhausted all my loan modification options.

consumer complaint narrative: On ( XX/XX/2023 ) I sent a letter regarding inaccurate Late payments, inaccurate negative accounts, bankruptcies and unknown things on my credit report. To this day over 60 days later I have not received a response yet. feel like i'm being taken advantage of and being ignored of my disputes. Section 611 ( a ) it is plainly stated that failure to investigate these items within 30 days gives a reason to immediately remove those negative items from my credit report as well as correct my late payments as paid on time. It has been over 60 days so they should be corrected promptly. I demand these negative accounts be deleted & correct late payments as paid on time immediately or I will file for litigation due to the stress you caused me. My information was also impacted by the Equifax data breach and may have got into the hands of the wrong person.

product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative:
My home is set for foreclosure sale date on XX/XX/XXXX by Wells Fargo. This bank failed to honor an existing modification agreement and then obstructed our efforts to resolve the matter. Their agents have made misrepresentations to us and their legal team along with our Attorney at the time colluded to steer us into a settlement agreement under duress. We immediately knew this was a mistake and have tried repeatedly to fix the problem but can't make any progress. We are inundated with several collection calls daily from Wells Fargo but when we call to try and fix this issue and get a review for homeowner assistance programs initiated we are ignored. We have been beaten down and broken by Wells Fargo and need help and need an investigation into their actions. We have the means to afford a fair mortgage payment but Wells Fargo will not consider this option as they XX/XX/XXXX to foreclosure. 

My wife and I purchased the home in XX/XX/XXXX with a predatory adjustable loan originated by XXXX and our monthly payment was {$1200.00}. My wife and I were both working full time and caring for our XXXX adult son. We soon realized that we had been misled at origination and that this was a toxic predatory loan. We contacted XXXX and in XX/XX/XXXX they agreed to modify our loan and lowered our monthly payment to {$680.00}. Our agreement stated that we would pay this fixed payment for three years and then the modification rate and payment would revert to the current market interest rate. The problem is that Wells Fargo did not follow through with this agreement, and our interest rate went up to 7.25 % in the 4th year. We began the process of trying to contact their agents and resolve this matter but ran into a brick wall. We literally had hundreds of conversations that went nowhere ; we also applied for modifications several times. At one point we were offered a new modification, but the offer was made verbally -- we requested the terms in writing, since we had already been misled by Wells Fargo in the past, but their agents refused to put the offer in writing. 

Due to Wells Fargo 's failure to honor the original modification and work with us our case ended up in the court system. We were set to go to trial in front of a jury but at a pre-trial mediation the Wells Fargo lawyers ADMITTED fault and told us they would give us a cash settlement of {$40000.00} if we signed over our house within the next year. We did not want to do this, but our Attorney pushed us and steered us into agreeing to this under duress. We knew the next day that this was a mistake -- XXXX XXXX immediately wired {$11000.00} to our Attorney as we were trying to reach him to tell him this was a mistake and we wanted to fight and try and save our home and that we were pushed into this agreement. However, our Attorney ignored our calls and disappeared. We were once again on our own, and began trying to resolve this directly with Wells Fargo. Like before, we could not make any progress and could not get any type of review initiated. We were in limbo, and the only consistent contact we received from Wells Fargo was multiple daily harassing phone calls from the collections department. 

We are now facing an imminent foreclosure sale date and are trying to rescind the settlement agreement due to the fact this was signed under duress. Wells Fargo will not engage with us and will not allow us to be considered for any retention options, they have written us off. This is wrong, we have the financial means to afford a fair payment and this problem is a result of Wells Fargo 's failure to honor the original modification we received from XXXX. Wells Fargo has acted in bad faith and their actions need to be investigated.

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
consumer complaint narrative: This is a complaint against timeshare XXXX XXXX. The people that I remember dealing with or were involved with this were XXXX XXXX & XXXX XXXX. When we spoke to them, they told me I was making a good financial investment & promised things would be positively different each time things got worse. They enticed us saying that we can actually make money from it by renting it out hence gaining rental income. Another profit would be if we decide to sell it because the resale value would go up, and even said it can go up {$29000.00}. We were alsotold that it had some tax benefits similar to owning a second home. We felt pressured especially when they said they needed " corporate approval '' in order to grant me the price being offered it's our last chance at the lowest price. They opened a credit card for me but we were never properly educated of the fees involved. Everything was rushed especially when they didn't even gave us enough time to read through the contract and understand it's contents so we can be fully aware of the details of the agreement. They have our ID during this process. They offered us gift vouchers. We weren't properly informed how to cancel. We didn't even know how many days to cancel. I was XXXX and my wife was XXXX y/o at the time and we feel like our ages were taken advantage of. We have medical conditions such as XXXX, XXXX problems, XXXX  XXXX  etc & having this timeshare just doesnt help, it just gives us financial difficulties. Plus, they will keep on calling everyday. Having this timeshare just causes us stress plus the current problems and issuses we have due to XXXX. Having this timeshare just makes our situation worse, the pressure when we spoke to them, not allowing time to read the contract, telling us we'll lose out on the deal if we wait. All we got is being stressed out ever since we had this timeshare. We were simply defrauded, lied to and was taken advantage of.

Debt collection
issue: Attempts to collect debt not owed
sub-issue: Debt was result of identity theft
consumer complaint narrative:
Dear CFPB, I am writing to you to bring to your attention a violation of the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ) by a debt collector. As per 15 USC 1692g, I have not received a proper validation notice from the debt collector. The notice provided to me fails to meet the requirements outlined in the FDCPA. 

When the debt collector first contacted me, they did not provide me with a validation notice as required by 15 USC 1692g. Instead, they simply demanded payment for an alleged debt. The letter I received from the debt collector only contained the amount of the alleged debt, the name and address of the creditor, and a statement that I had XXXX  days to dispute the debt, but it did not include a clear statement of my rights under the FDCPA nor the steps I need to take to dispute the debt. This is a violation of my rights under the FDCPA. 

I am requesting that you take immediate action to ensure that the debt collector is held accountable for their actions. I would like for them to be required to provide me with a valid validation notice and remove any negative credit reporting until they have done so. Additionally, I would like for them to pay any damages that have resulted from their actions. 

Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from you soon. 

Sincerely, XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative:
In our XXXX end-of-year escrow statement, SLS told us that we had a shortage in our impounded funds ( due to reassessed property tax ), and told us what our new payment would be. On XXXX XXXX, XXXX, SLS acknowledged receipt of a letter from us disputing the amount being demanded and offering an alternative payment plan. On XXXX XXXX, XXXX, SLS sent us a letter turning down our alternative plan and demanding the original amount. 
While this payment amount was in dispute, we made our XXXX XXXX payment on XXXX XXXX, XXXX. We paid {$2700.00}, which was not the new amount SLS told us to pay, but was more than enough to cover our principal and interest due for XXXX XXXX, as well as an increased amount for our escrow account. 
However, SLS did not apply the funds we sent to our account. Instead of paying first the interest, then the principal and then putting whatever was left into the escrow account -- which SLS holds as a service to us -- the entire amount was put into " unidentified funds unapplied. '' This, in turn, made it look as if we had not made our XXXX payment -- although again I emphasize that there was more than enough to cover our principal and interest -- and we were charged a late fee, which I paid. 
I have been a homeowner since XXXX XXXX, and I have never once had a late payment. My husband owned a home for four years and never once had a late payment. NEVER. 
And we did n't make this payment late, either. The issue is the order in which the funds were applied. 
When our loan was first transferred to SLS, in XXXX XXXX, both our old mortgage company and our new company paid our homeowners insurance. XXXX sent me a refund check for the second payment, and I sent it to SLS to be reapplied to our escrow account. It took three months and numerous phone calls to get that simple thing done correctly.

They are reporting another individuals social security number under my name with all the credit reporting bureaus.

product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative: I am a first time home buyer and I purchased a home using Stearn 's Lending Mortgage Brokers in XXXX 2016. I was failed by Stearn 's Lending and the apprasial company because I trusted what I was told by both the apprasier and the mortage broker. The apprasier valued my home for XXXX without considering the roof and the bank allowed this to happen. I am now in a hardship financial situation now because the apprasier that was selected by Stearn 's Lending to appraise my home did not appraise the roof for any damage or age issues. I questioned my Stearn 's broker about it and told her I was not happy that the roof was not apprasied and how could the life span of the roof not contribute to the value of the home. I asked for the appraiser to be contacted and asked to go back and appraise the roof but she said they were not able to interact with the appraiser because they were an independent company. That made no sense to me but sense I was a new home buyer and trusted her information I believed her. Now that I have closed on the house, I learn that there are XXXX roofs on the house with a hole in the left corner and dryrot all around the whole perimeter of the house. I 've had XXXX roofers look at the roof and both said they would not patch a roof with that much dryrot so my only option now is to replace the roof. That is XXXX plus for me to pay when it should of been addressed before I purchased the home. The roofer also noticed that part of the outside wall of the back of the house was not wood but actually plaster! I was told that the seller did that cheep repair just to sell the house but when it rains, that plaster is going to start crumbling. The seller also repaired the master bedroom celing by spraying a sealant instead of using sheetrock. Once again here is something that should of been reported by the apprasial because it was visually accessable to him but it was n't listed at all. I want CFPB to look into my problem because I am in a hardship situation and I feel like I was taken advantage of. The value of the home could not be what the apprasier set it as with a roof with dryrot and a hole in it. I feel like there was some sort of fraud or neglect by the apprasier and the mortgage broker to protect me and put me in a house that is totally functional. Since they did not protect me it has left me in a financial hardship and a home that may incure structure damage and be inhabital for me and my son to live in if I do n't get this roof and wall repaired. I am devistated, please help me. Thank you

consumer complaint narrative:
TODAYS DATE : XX/XX/XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, XXXX XXXX, FL XXXX ATTENTION DISPUTE DEPARTMENT XXXX  XXXX- Reported : XX/XX/2020 - {$8900.00} Closed To Whom It May Concern : This letter is being sent to you in response to a notice a couple entries by your company on mycredit reports. Be advised that this is not a refusal to pay, but a notice sent pursuant to the Fair DebtCollection Practices Act, 15 USC 1692g Sec. 809 ( b ) that your claim is disputed and validation isrequested.This is NOT a request for verification or proof of my mailing address, but a request for VALIDATION made pursuant to the above named Title and Section. I respectfully request that your offices provide me with competent evidence that I have any legal obligation to pay you What do I need you to provide as the debt validation. 
What the money you say I owe is for Explain and show me how you calculated what you say I owe Provide me with copies of any papers that show I agreed to pay what you say I owe Provide a verification or copy of any judgment if applicable Identify the original creditor Prove the Statute of Limitations has not expired on this account Show me that you are licensed to collect in my state Provide me with your license numbers and Registered Agent Proof that the collection company owns the debt/or has been assigned the debt. ( You are legallyentitled to collect this particular debt from me. ) This is basic contract law. 
Complete payment history, starting with the original creditor. ( I need to have proof of my payment history with original Creditor, what the amount of the debt was when the creditor assigned the debt to your company, and what fees/interest has been tacked on to this debt andhow you/they determined these fees. ) This requirement was established by the case Fields v.Wilber Law Firm, XXXX XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX, USCA-02-C-0072, 7th Circuit Court, Sept 2004.. 
Copy of the credit card application. ( My contract with theoriginal creditor establishing the debt between us. ) This is also basic contract law. 

XXXX, XXXX XXXX SOC SEC # XXXX DOB XX/XX/XXXX ADDRESS XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX , XXXX XXXX, FL XXXX

consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX XXXX XXXX Account Number XXXX According to my credit report, XXXX XXXXXXXX XXXX has filed a charge-off in the amount of {$5200.00}. In light of this, I am writing to express my concern about the lack of proper documentation associated with this charge-off and to bring to your attention a potential violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ). 

As per my understanding of IRS regulations, when a creditor charges off an amount owed by a customer, it is required to issue a Form 1099-C to the debtor. This form is crucial for accurate reporting of income and compliance with tax regulations. To date, I have not received any such form from XXXX XXXX XXXX, and I am concerned about the potential repercussions of not having the necessary documentation for tax purposes. 

Moreover, I believe that the lack of documentation from XXXX XXXX XXXX may constitute a violation of the Fair Credit Reporting Act. The FCRA mandates that accurate and complete information be reported by creditors, and failure to provide essential documentation may result in inaccurate reporting on my credit file. 

In light of the above, I kindly request that you investigate the matter and ensure that XXXX XXXX XXXX provides the necessary documentation, including a Form 1099-C, related to the charge-off on my credit report. I am seeking clarity on the validity of this charge-off and require the proper documentation to fulfill my tax obligations. 

Please provide me with updates on the status of your investigation and any steps taken to rectify this matter. Your prompt attention to this request is greatly appreciated, and I trust that you will take the necessary measures to ensure compliance with the FCRA.

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
consumer complaint narrative:
To Whom It May Concern : 15 USC 1681 ( c ) ( 2 ) Except as otherwise provided in this section, a consumer reporting agency shall block the reporting of any information in the file of a consumer that the consumer identifies as information that resulted from an alleged identity theft, not later than 4 business days after the date of receipt by such agency of ( 1 ) appropriate proof of the identity of the consumer ; ( 2 ) a copy of an identity theft report ; ( 3 ) the identification of such information by the consumer; and ( 4 ) a statement by the consumer that the information is not information relating to any transaction by the consumer.

I have contacted Equifax fourteen times, via certified mail, consumer protection financial bureaus portal, and Equifaxs dispute portal to dispute fraudulent accounts which were a direct result of identity theft, on my consumer report. 
Despite providing proof of the Federal Trade Commissions identity theft affidavit, police reports, my current drivers license and utility bill, and a dispute letter stating that the information/ transactions were fraudulent and not relating to any transaction by me, Equifax has failed to follow the law, conduct an actual investigation, and remove all fraudulent information from my consumer report. In accordance with 15 USC 1681 ( c-2 ) ( 1 ) ( 2 ) ( 3 ) ( 4 ), Equifax should have blocked all information resulting from identity theft within 4 days.

15 USC 1681 ( b ) ( a ) ( 2 ) Subject to subsection ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : In accordance with the written instructions of the consumer to whom it relates. 
Based on the above laws and circumstantial situation, I demand the deletion of the following account : 1. XXXX XXXX ( XXXX ), Account # : XXXX 2. XXXX, Account # : XXXX 15 USC 1681 ( a ) ( 4 ) There is a need to ensure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy. 
As there are a multitude of inaccurate variations, I demand a deletion of all personal identifiable information from my consumer credit report with the exception of : 1. My Full Legal Name : XXXX XXXX XXXX ( delete all other names ) 2. My Address : XXXX XXXX XXXX # XXXX XXXX, VA XXXX ( delete all other addresses ) Please delete all other addresses, as I can not receive mail or any correspondence, nor do I have access to any of these addresses. Please delete these fraudulent addresses and update the address with the correct one above. 
My only Phone number is ( XXXX ) XXXX XXXX. 
Delete any and all other phone numbers. 
I demand my social security number and date of birth be removed from being displayed on the credit file for privacy reasons. 
Pursuant to the FAIR CREDIT REPORTING ACT 15 USC 1681 ( a ) ( 4 ), I am a federally protected consumer and I have a right to privacy. Not granting me my rights is in direct violation of 15 USC 1681 and all its subsections

No email ever arrived but did receive my XX/XX/2021 statement. product: Mortgage
sub-product: Home equity loan or line of credit (HELOC)
consumer complaint narrative:
I had a second mortgage with Wells Fargo ( {$110000.00} ). I had trouble when my husband was sick keeping up with our mortgage payments ( for 1st & 2nd ). I applied for a mortgage modification with both lenders. I was told by Wells Fargo that they wait to hear if the 1st mortgage approves a loan modification, then they follow suit. In 2013 XXXX, the holder of our 1st mortgage approved the mortgage modification. Upon learning that we were granted the mortgage modification, Wells Fargo converted our 2nd mortgage into a personal loan. They placed it in default and told me that if I did not pay the full amount they would foreclose on my house. 

Wells Fargo also filed for wage garnishment with the Circuit Court of XXXX County. I received a letter in the mail after the fact, but was not notified of the I had no option but to pull all of my money out of my 401k to pay them off ( {$77000.00} ). I also had to take additional loans out to pay off the full amount. 

By pulling this money out I lost my retirement savings, I took a huge tax hit. ( this is because they changed it from a mortgage loan to a personal loan ( without my knowledge ) ) Even though I satisfied the loan it is still on my publicly view-able court record for XXXX County ( as well as for XXXX XXXX XXXX County, because they filed in both accidentally ) I have email exchanges with their attorney XXXX XXXX admitting to the filing mistake and promising to fix it. It was never fixed. 

I had no choice but to pay it off as my job requires clearance level that I would lose if I had foreclosure or wage garnishments on my records. 

I have lots of documentation from this period of time. 

I made some phone calls at the time to try to find a way to complain, but was told by everywhere I reached out to, there was nothing they could do. I would like to pursue this at this time because as I watch the news I am learning there are more and more people in bad situation due to Wells Fargo and I like them held accountable.

During the course of this year is when I started receiving phone calls about my XXXX mortgage being in default and that it is in foreclosure status, while giving me no further information on a loan that hadnt been active for 13 years or the courses of action that I could take to obtain information or get better details on how to try to resolve this issue. I have continued to try and see my options might be and the only resolution that was offered to me by SLS was a modification without any documents but wanted {$27000.00} within 20 days and a signed modification which only last XXXX years, otherwise the loan will need to be sold and terms go back. This loan I have I got back in 2007 where it was stated income no proof of income on an adjustable arm that doesn't cap. As of today 's date, there is {$99000.00} in interest fee, the principal is {$55000.00} I have been trying to work with the lender because I can afford the monthly payment on the XXXX mortgage, but they will not allow it unless I do this modification which is not permeant. SLS said there is no other options no one else to talk to. I am currently working with rural housing to help me get into a modification so I can keep my home. I want to keep this home ; I have XXXX children that have grown up in this home which we love. I continue to hope SLS will work with me l, but it doesn't look that way as I have been served legal papers for foreclosure. The list of account below have violated my Federal Protected Consumer Rights, to privacy and confidentiality under. 15 USC 1681. Which is under the Fair Credit Reporting Act. 

( XXXX  ) ACCOUNT # : XXXX. / ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX ) ACCOUNT # : XXXX. / ( XXXX XXXX ) ACCOUNT # : XXXX / ( XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  ) ACCOUNT # : XXXX. Has violated my rights. 

U.S. Code 1681 Section 602- ( a ) There is a need to insure that consumer reporting agencies exercise their grave responsibilities with fairness, impartiality, and a respect for the consumers right to privacy U.S. Code 1681 Section 604- ( a ) ( 2 ) it also states a consumer reporting agency can not furnish account with out my written instruction U.S. Code 1681 Section 605- ( b ) ( c ), any consumer reporting agency may furnish a consumer report under the following circumstances and no other : ( 1 ) In response to the order of a court having jurisdiction to issue such an order, a subpoena issued in connection with proceedings before a Federal grand jury, or a subpoena issued in accordance with section 5318 of title 31 or section 3486 of title 18 U.S. Code 1681c - ( a ) ( 5 ) Any other adverse item of information, other than records of convictions of crimes which antedates the report by more than seven years.

U.S. Code 1681s -2 ( 1 ) ( a ) Reporting information with actual knowledge of errors A person shall not furnish any information relating to a consumer to any consumer reporting agency if the person knows or has reasonable cause to believe that the information is inaccurate.

consumer complaint narrative:
I'm submitting this complaint today with the assistance of an attorney due to the negative impact this negligence had on my credit report. I've listed the account in question and a copy of this is also being submitted to XXXX XXXX along with my supporting documentation. I'm also forwarding this to XXXX. 

Account : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX was sold to XXXX and then sold to XXXX. 
Current owner : XXXX Payments : On XX/XX/XXXX, I paid {$580.00} to XXXX. I've attached the bank statement that details clearly the monies being taken out of my account on said date. 

XXXX : XXXX XXXX reported me " late '' for the following months in XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX. 
XXXX XXXX reported me as " late for the following months in XX/XX/XXXX and XX/XX/XXXX Follow-up : I called XXXX less than 7 days ago and asked for a letter stating that payment was made ad received XX/XX/XXXX. The letter I received states that payment was received XX/XX/XXXX. 

Problem : A. This is not the date it was paid. Even if this were so, how could XXXX XXXX even report me as late after an alleged payment in XXXX was made? 
B. In addition, how is it possible that XXXX XXXX is reporting any late payment ( s ), when they are not the owner of the account? 
XXXX The statement sent to me by XXXX is false regard the date they're stating payment was made My attorney has recommended that I first reach out to the CFPB to make my complaint prior to moving forward in any other legal manner. This is false information reporting on my credit file and the account must immediately be deleted from my credit report. I'm aware that creditors can not just " verify '' without proving paperwork to substantiate their claim, especially when I've pointed out that this information is false. 

This account must be immediately removed from my credit report. The fact that the bureaus allow for this reporting to continue is clearly negligence on their part, as the factor listed in section Problem : B of this complaint.

consumer complaint narrative:
Background : purchased vehicle XX/XX/XXXX ; loan from GM Financial. Address on original lease agreement was entered ( by dealer ) incorrectly. XXXX mailed Welcome Letter with account information ( which is needed to sign up to their online site to make payment ). Address sent to had very specific need ; if not addressed correctly, mail would go undelivered. This was a brand new building that required we get our mail at the post office at times. I tried several times to obtain account information with XXXX and my car dealer ; was told each time I would get that information mailed to me. 

I was finally able to get the account number and register online and set up autopay. However, XXXX notified 2 credit reporting agencies of a 30 day late payment for two different months ; one was never notified. 

XXXX : XX/XX/XXXX - Late 30 Days XXXX : XX/XX/XXXX - Late 30 Days XXXX : XX/XX/XXXX - Unknown ( data ) I disputed this several times and was told the information was reported accurately ; however, the above information differs between credit reporting agencies and is not consistent. 

I attempted to resolve this with the XXXX and provided proof that the address used by XXXX was incorrect. They continued to say the reporting was accurate, ignoring any goodwill. They misstated that they used the correct address, adjusting their letters once I informed them of the correct delivery address ; they continue to maintain they used the correct address and said that nothing was returned to them as undelivered. In fact their first letter in response to my complaint had the incorrect address. XXXX made a simple clerical error, or the dealer did, and I addressed it as soon as I was aware of it but XXXX was unwilling to show any good faith in me as a customer and make a change to my credit files, something they have the absolute power to do. 

Since resolving the issue of the account number, my payments were made by auto payment and I sold the vehicle and the account was closed in XX/XX/XXXX. This negative mark, caused by their dealers error, has caused significant negative damage to my credit. 

Please note the letter from XXXX dated XX/XX/XXXX shows my correct address at the time. The letter states : " Our records indicate, a Welcome Letter and first billing statement were mailed to your address of record being XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, NV XXXX. I have included copies of both documents for your review along with a copy of the Lease Agreement and account payment history. '' Also attached is the original Welcome Letter dated XX/XX/XXXX - please note the address : XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX, NV XXXX ( missing is the calling out " XXXX XXXX which is vital to delivery, unfortunately, but included in their letter from XX/XX/XXXX, falsely stating they sent it to the correct address. 

A second letter dated XX/XX/XXXX states the Welcome Letter was sent to the address on record listed on the Lease Agreement ( attached- please note the address ) ; however, the lease agreement address is incorrect, as entered by the original dealer. The letter states that " numerous attempts were also made to contact you via telephone at ( XXXX ) XXXX ; however, were unsuccessful. '' This statement is troubling because since XX/XX/XXXX, I have 2 calls from GM Financial and 1 message, and that was in response to my complaint in XXXX. 

Also attached is a request for assistance letter dated XX/XX/XXXX to my Congressional Representative asking to assist in the issue with mail delivery. Specifically noted : " USPS is not delivering our mail ; claims the address is unacceptable ; USPS has said they do not like that our unit number is more than 3 digits long. '' It took almost two years to have our mail delivery situation corrected. 

XXXX has not responded to any communications from me since XX/XX/XXXX.

consumer complaint narrative:
CFPB + True Accord, On a recent review of emails, I received an email from True Accord saying I owe a debt. I am requesting validation of this debt. 

Attached to this email are : - copy of drivers license - this serves as ID as well as address - written complaint I hereby notify you that I am disputing this debt in its entirety, and you are required to provide me with validation of the debt by providing me all of the following information : Copy of original contractual agreement bearing my signature A clause in the original signed contract that authorizes a third party like yourself to collect on this debt. 

Statements from the original creditor and itemization of monies owed Copy of bill showing last default date Proof that the debt is valid and collectible and within the statute of limitations for this state Proof that you are licensed to collect in my state of residence Agreement between your company and the original creditor that authorizes you to collect on this debt I am also requesting that you cease and desist from all collection activity pertaining to this account. 

You are only to contact me via the CFPB as well as mail at the address I have provided herein. 

I am allowing you a period of 30 days or less to produce this information. If youre unable to validate the account, then you are to remove the collection account from my credit reports. 

Your failure to act will result in this matter being referred to the Attorney Generals Office.

I had no choice but to get a vehicle at the time I did because my car broke down so I had to go to a car lot that had used cars that were affordable so at about XXXX my father and I were approved together to get a SUV which was around {$9000.00} with a XXXX down payment in a car payment of XXXX a month I paid the car payment faithfully every month on time up until the end of XXXX about XXXX the car broke down and was not fixable at least it was not affordable for me I tried to work with the creditor and explain the car was not fixable on my end I was told I did not matter they were very unprofessional and not willing to work with me in any way I had no choice but to get another vehicle in much I have to go through someone else..But Mariner finance being the original creditor for the first car had the car picked up not long after which I had no problem with and understood. We are now in XXXX I have several times try to talk to the company I have been threatened that I will never have credit again they will do whatever it takes to ruin my credit they they run hard inquiries whenever they feel like it they have an amount more than with a car was ever Worth or what my loan ever consisted of they did not take an account the down payment that was put down on the car or the 2 years of paying {$240.00} a month they sold the vehicle for a decent amount and they are constantly reporting even though it says the account has been closed as of the end of XXXX I believe they are running hard inquiries to try to keep my credit from getting better they're constantly every month doing something with my account I don't understand how it says the account has been closed but yet I am continuously getting updates of things they are doing on my account and like I said I have talked to them several times and ask them why they keep doing this and they laugh and think it's funny and tell me that they're going to ruin me and don't expect to ever have good credit again it will never happen we will make sure of that I am a single mother of three on social security I can not pay them I do not have the ability to pay them and I believe it is 100 % unjust completely for them to keep running hard inquiries and keep updating different amounts way way above what the car originally was worth we're bought for this company is very unprofessional how are we supposed to ever trust creditors with our personal information when they use it for harassment this has to be based off trust and I have lost all trust it is absolutely wrong that these companies can do what they want with our personal information any day I need this resolved if I am allowed to press charges I want to I would like to know what my options are and I hope somebody could get back to me because I want to go as far as I can to get what is fair the stress this company has caused me is unbelievable every time I see the name cross my phone notifications I feel like I can't breathe they should not be allowed to ever do the things they do and get away with it..!!! 
If anyone that reads this could get back to me and let me know where I can go from here please email me at XXXX XXXX

product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative: On XX/XX/XXXX I received a denial letter from Chase saying that the investment property in which I initial ask for a modification on was denied. There was only XXXX program that fit the scope of modifying my investment property which was a Home Affordable Modification XXXX Tier XXXX XXXX. The other programs listed several reasons why I could n't qualify for the other programs but the Home Affordable Modification XXXX Tier XXXX ) simply said the debt to income ratio could n't be calculated within the acceptable range of 25 % to 42 %. Based off the underwriter using a gross rental income of {$910.00} XXXX based off XXXX lease and not XXXX leases for this XXXX building XXXX it was easy to sumise that they needed all of the leases. I submitted all the perpective information by the end of XXXX with updated information and all of the leases. On XX/XX/XXXX I received another letter saying the modification was denied. After reading again through all of much the same information I came upon the reason it was denied in coralation with the Home Affordable Modification XXXX Tier XXXX XXXX. It now stated that Chase services the mortgage on behalf of the insurer and can only approve certain programs. Not only was this statement not on the first denial ( hence I would have never reapplied ) but it gives the impression that Chase strung me alone putting me in a deeper financial bind when they never was able to offer me a modification on an investment property. The entire process started XX/XX/XXXX and I received my first letter of decision on XX/XX/XXXX. I was informed by Chase that in accordance with my loan I could receive a modification on my investment property. Years later I find that they never intended on helping me but instead gives me misleading information, lies, ambiguious language, contradictory approvals and eventually sends me more in to a deeper financial whole. What Chase has done is not only morally wrong, but legally wrong to a homeowner. It goes against the principalities of what banking and Finance, consumer protection Federal bureau, and any other entity that oversees money and finance when it come to the public interest. Due to the uncertainties of the denial and the truthfulness of them Im still not sure if Chase offers a modification program for investment property. If Im to go buy the first denial letter I would say yes given the denial reason but if I was to go by the second denial it would be no which means this whole process has been not only a scam to further place a homeowner is a detrimental financial state but a waste of tremendous time. I also noticed that the eligibility data was not included in the new decline letter ( hmm I wonder why ).

issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
sub-issue: Their investigation did not fix an error on your report
consumer complaint narrative: I have disputed items on my credit report due to they are inaccurate and unverifiable. The credit companies XXXX, Experian, and XXXX has not fixed the problem despite the evidence that has been sent via certified mail. According to the FCRA they are required under to have a copy of the original creditors documentation on file to verify that this information is mine and is correct. In the results of there investigations and reinvestigations they stated in writing that they verified that these items are being reported correctly. Who verified these accounts? How did they verify these accounts? FCRA states that information has to be 100 % accurate which clearly it is not! They have NOT provided me a copy of ANY original documentation aka contract with my signature on it after asking them several times now! FCRA states under Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) & Section 611 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ) that they have to provide me with it if I request it which they haven't. Next they have failed to provide the method of verification they used as required under Section 611 ( a ) ( 7 ). These are the FCRA rules not mine so why aren't they following them? Lastly, under Section 611 ( 5 ) ( A ) of the FCRA they are required to promptly DELETE all information which can not be verified. Which they have not done either, again why aren't they following the rules? Why do we have these rules if they aren't enforced or followed?

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
sub-issue: Their investigation did not fix an error on your report
consumer complaint narrative:
In reviewing the provided XXXX  credit Report forwarded to me furnished by XXXX dated XX/XX/XXXX ; when concerning XXXX XXXX XXXX, it is clear the data is inaccurate and holds discrepancies. The report lists the date of first delinquency as XX/XX/XXXX. In comparison to the XXXX  Credit report pulled XX/XX/XXXX the first date of delinquency is XX/XX/XXXX. Moreover, as seen in the billing documents provided to me directly from XXXX XXXX  XXXX, the date of first delinquency is listed as XX/XX/XXXX. Though Ive furnished these documents in several occasions XXXX  refuses to properly update and remove the inaccuracies although they are aware the credit age exceeds 7 years and have also been advised the car was stolen in XX/XX/XXXX shortly following the primary account holders ( my brothers ) diagnosed XXXX XXXX. When speaking with an XXXX  customer care rep XX/XX/XXXX I requested the date when the date of first delinquency was altered as I previously recalled the account being reported prior to XXXX. I was advised the representative could not access my earlier historical payment history as all creditors/lenders reportings automatically roll off a credit file after 7 years. However based on the provided credit reports XXXX managed to remove 2 years of credit history in roughly 9 months and is clearly being dishonest about having accessing to prior account information. 

I co-signed on a vehicle financed by XXXX in XX/XX/XXXX. Unfortunately my brother XXXX, the primary owner was admitted to a XXXX XXXX following our little brothers murder. During the time I was the resident of a XXXX XXXX  center and my brothers vehicle was stolen. My family was distressed by the sequential tragedies between myself, and my XXXX brother. They were not properly notified until years following XXXX XXXX. Several instances throughout my XXXX  I attempted to sort out the issues but due to recurrent relapse it was extremely difficult. My brother and I were both victims of identity theft. I contacted XXXX XXXX and requested information on the vehicle to proceed with notifying authorities. In XX/XX/XXXX XXXX provided me a historical payment history displaying the first delinquency date as XXXX. They also forwarded a copy of the correspondence the sent to an unknown address in Arkansas which was provided to them from the thief of the vehicle. They are fully aware the vehicle was stolen and yet continue to report the inaccurate and differential vehicle history which is damaging my entire life. In XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX XXXX XXXX was found guilty of falsely reporting derogatory remarks on millions of there customers accounts. ( specifically altering the date of last delinquency and closed accounts ) Ive contacted all three bureaus and XXXX has since removed the account. Exquifax is in process and XXXX REFUSES TO REMOVE THE INACCURACY, Though Ive supplied the same information to ALL THREE bureaus. XXXX  also refuses to remove several inaccurate reports on my credit file, while both XXXX  and Equifax stated they received my initial fraud dispute from XXXX  XX/XX/XXXX. XXXX  and XXXX are deliberately ignoring the guidelines and laws that protect consumers. XXXX reported my accounts differently to ALL THREE BUREAUS. 


XXXX  also upholds that the bankruptcy they claim XXXX XXXX has listed is owned by myself. I have attempted to resolve this falsely reported bankruptcy. I contacted XXXX XXXX and disputed the information and was sent a correspondence stating there were no records for me. Again both Equifax and XXXX  have removed the false report as all three credit bureaus verify records via XXXX XXXX and there is no such accurate record. For several years Ive fought against this and its caused an unnecessary amount of additional strain on my recovery. To date, XXXX  is the only 1 out of the 3 credit bureaus that continuously fails to ensure my credit is properly reported.

product: Mortgage
Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
consumer complaint narrative:
This is a formal complaint that you are reporting inaccurate and incomplete credit information. 
According to the Fair Credit Reporting Act, Section 609 ( a ) ( 1 ) ( A ), you are required by federal law to verify, through the physical verification of the original signed consumer contract, any and all accounts that you post on a credit report. Otherwise anyone paying for your reporting services could fax, mail or email in a fraudulent account. 

I demand to see verifiable proof ( i.e. : an original consumer contract with my signature on it ) that you have on file for the account listed. 

Your failure to positively verify these accounts has hurt my ability to obtain credit. Under the FCRA, unverifiable accounts must be removed and if you are unable to provide me a copy of verifiable proof, you must remove the account listed.

Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Mortgage
sub-issue: Trying to communicate with the company to fix an issue with the loan closing
consumer complaint narrative: My ex-husband and I refinanced our marital home in XXXX with Pennymac. I was already on the title from XXXX purchase. I was not allowed on the loan. I was a homemaker without income. I divorced due to XXXX XXXX, the process was lengthy as my ex-husband sought to sabotage the process and my finances. Shortly after separation I heard rumor he put the home in XXXX forbearance despite being financially unaffected by XXXX. I pleaded with the mortgage co to talk with me, they could not because he would not cooperate. I was/am living in the home with our children. Divorce was final On XX/XX/XXXX. Final orders awarded the house to me in XXXX of XXXX. At this time I was able to communicate with Pennymac and began making payments towards a trial period to avoid foreclosure. I thoroughly explained the situation in great detail. I made every payment during the modification period and was waiting on the county clerk to issue a certified copy of the divorce decree. While waiting I was allowed to make the 1st payment towards the new loan outside the trial period and they assured me they had enough information to begin working with me. When I called to make the 2nd payment on the new loan I was informed they'd put it into foreclosure. ALL COMMUNICATION was being directed to my violent exhusband I asked them to please send copies of communication to the home on the loan and they would not. They would not add my phone number for contact for months. They would not communicate with me about modification. They sent that information to my ex-husband as well. I've been trying to save this loan since I was allowed to make my first payment in XXXX of XXXX they've refused to cooperate, communicate, or accept any payment from me. They have a copy of the special warranty deed filed with real property records and my decree. I've legally satisfied successorship. They've moved the home into foreclosure again. This home is all that I have in the world. I have good credit and steady income and a willing coborrower with steady significant income and excellent credit. They are unwilling to find a way to work with me. I have begged. I have cried. Everytime I call the phone is routed randomly to a representative and I have to spend a great deal of time explaining a very complicated situation. They have never once provided me with XXXX letter or document regarding the salvage of this loan. They took my money, but won't let me have my house. It has significant equity, but is in need of a great deal of repair due to my ex-husband. I am a single mother with a full time job for the first time in 20 years. It is my home. I am BEGGING them to take my MONEY!! PENNYMAC IS TRYING TO TAKE EVERYTHING FROM ME by continuing to perpetuate his abuse. This has complete control of my life and my financial well being and future!! I have called regularly. I have provided everything asked of me repeatedly!! Stop contributing to my violent ex-husband 's financial abuse!!! Ive been fighting SO HARD for SO LONG to get them to take me seriously, communicate, and accept payments from me on my house. It feels like they want my equity more than they want a roof over my kids heads!! MY EX-HUSBAND IS BEING GIVEN MORE RIGHTS WITH PENNYMAC DESPITE THE LEGAL VERIFICATION THAT THE RIGHT OF OWNERSHIP IS NOW MINE!!! ALL I WANT IS TO GIVE THEM MY MONEY FOR MY HOME!!!!!

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
Debt collection
consumer complaint narrative:
Around XXXX I opened a credit card account with XXXX XXXX XXXX  XXXX XXXX  with an initial credit limit of {$300.00}. XXXX. After my first XXXX to XXXX months of paying on time they raised my credit limit to {$750.00}, after paying it off I noticed extra charges on the credit card and reported it to XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX. The person I spoke to said the charges were mine and I told him to turn off the credit card. I continued making payments but I kept seeing new charges on my statement. I called and complained again and the person said it would be taken care of. By not doing what they said they harassed me. 
They contacted a relative who told them I didn't live there and we were estranged. They were told that I don't live there and they should not contact them again or he would consider it harassment and turn it over to the attorney general. He was told his address would be stricken from any form of contact. For the last couple of years he has since been receiving mail in my name along with a court summons. This is in violation of The Fair Debt Collection Act. I feel they knowingly sent collection letters to humiliate me as a form of harassment. 
In XX/XX/XXXX I called again when I was getting ready to buy my home and seen it was on my credit report, I tried settling with them and they said they would only take the full amount due. I then explained what had happened but they wouldn't listen this is harassment. Since then it has fallen off of my credit report, but on XX/XX/XXXX it reappeared on my credit report under LVNV Funding LLC and the amount owed had jumped to {$1100.00}. In XX/XX/XXXX I called LVNV Funding and tried once again to settle this account by either payments or a cash lesser settlement amount at that time I gave LVNV Funding my current address and phone number. LVNV Funding declined saying they would only settle for the amount of {$1100.00}. This again is a form of harassment. 
In XX/XX/XXXX I found out from a relative that they had a letter from a law firm addressed to me at their residence. I had them open it for me and it was an advertisement of a law firm wanting to represent me for my court case on XX/XX/XXXX XXXX.I never received a notice from LVNV Funding about this issue. The court case was filed in XXXX XXXX XXXX, Missouri. I live in XXXX XXXX Illinois, a XXXX difference and a place I haven't lived in about XXXX years. This is again a form of harassment. 
I took off of work for the court date and drove there to find out that LVNV Funding had dropped the lawsuit on XX/XX/XXXX without prejudice. This has been a form of harassment for many years they will not work with me and keep holding this fraudulent debt above my head for almost eleven years. I feel like this court date is another form of harassment because they know I don't live there and by dropping this case and making me miss work is harassment. Then receiving the cancellation of the case by letter after the court date at the wrong address is harassment.

product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
issue: Problem with a credit reporting company's investigation into an existing problem
consumer complaint narrative:
I have a problem with XXXX XXXX my mortgage company. They put a 30 day late notice on my credit report because my taxes went up and I did not know about it so my payment came out of my bank automatically as it does every month for the same amount not the new amount. If I had known about this I would have fixed it right away. The only way I found out about it was through a notice from the credit bureaus which I monitor daily because I am trying to secure a loan to build a new home and need my credit score as high as possible. As soon as I got the noticed I called XXXX and paid the {$80.00} difference. I asked them to remove the late and they said no because its accurate and they tried to contact me. I have NOT spoken to anyone from XXXX XXXX  about this issue prior. They said they sent letters and made phone calls. The only things I received from them is calls to refinance my mortgage which I have told them numbers time I do NOT want to do. 
First I spoke to : XXXX XXXX Team Leader XXXX She said the information was accurate and she would not be able to do anything about it. After requesting to speak to her superior for 5 minutes she finally transferred me to someone else. That someone else was : XXXX XXXX Team Leader Account Resolution XXXX I was very disappointed when I asked for a superior I received someone with the same title. I told her my story and she would not help at all either. I again asked for a supervisor and she was even more defiant. After about 5 minutes of requesting a supervision she finally told me she would have someone call me back. 

In the mean time I took to XXXX to message them and post about my complaint on their page. I immediately received a response that they were sorry and would try to resolve the issue. I was told to email : XXXX XXXX then called me and said he would discuss with the higher ups and would call me back An hour later I received a phone call from : XXXX XXXX Servicing Escalation Specialist XXXX He told me same thing the others did that it was my fault and they would not change the credit report. 

I am extremely upset about this. I have not missed a payment with them in over 5 years and been an outstanding customer and over something I had no idea about and wasn't my fault they refuse to help me or even work with me. They claim to be # 1 in customer satisfaction well definitely not this time. 

I then reached out the the credit bureaus to see if there is anything they can do. They told me I can file a dispute but all that is going to do is go back to XXXX XXXX to verify if the information on my report is correct and we already know they are going to say yes. 

As a consumer I fell trapped and helpless. My score dropped over 50 point and no one will ever give me a loan with a missed payment on my record and I did not miss a payment. The payment came out of my account automatically like it does every month. I paid my bill! ( See attached ) I have no recourse because the only one that has any say or power over this is XXXX XXXX and they have made it clear they will not change this or work with me on this. So I am forced to accept this even though I feel it is completely wrong. I won't be able to get a loan for my new house all because of something I had no idea about. I have been working for years to get my credit repair and now all of that is down the drain because of this. 

PLEASE HELP!

product: Consumer Loan
issue: Problems when you are unable to pay
consumer complaint narrative: Since XX/XX/XXXX, it appears Regional acceptance has not been honest with me regarding my balance, the balances due, interest accrual and what my payments are applied while at the same time not providing me with statements. I have spoken with several reps and each provide conflicting information and confirmed they were not sure what the fees were. If reps for Regional Acceptance are not aware of what the fees were for how could the customer. A representative recently contacted me and indicated my account was 50 day past due and the amount of {$1600.00} due. This balance confused me since my payments are {$440.00} a month. I asked the representative what made up the {$1600.00} and the rep did not know. the rep indicated she would research and call me back. She did n't return my call but other reps continued to call and I would ask them what made up the {$1600.00} since my payments were {$440.00} a month and each would indicate they were fees but could not provide information on what the fees were and the amount of the " fees '' s. Saturday, XX/XX/XXXX, I spoke with a rep name XXXX who informed me that the {$1600.00} due was made up of {$120.00} remaining from XX/XX/XXXX, {$440.00} for the months of XXXX, XXXX and XX/XX/2017, {$21.00} in late fees and {$150.00} in check fees. this is a total of {$1600.00}. I asked was this all the fees. XXXX indicated yes and this is why {$1600.00} was due. I then asked about the {$450.00} payment received on XX/XX/XXXX, the {$900.00} payment received on XX/XX/XXXX and the {$400.00} payment on XX/XX/XXXX. XXXX confirmed receipt of the payments but indicated those payments were applied to the separate interest that runs at the same time as the interest on this account. XXXX confirmed the {$900.00} and the {$400.00} payments were not applied to the interest, the principal of the loan, the late fees nor the returned check fees but to some other interest that I was never informed of. I spoke with a rep today in client services named XXXX who again provided different information and indicated that my account had been delinquent when I accepted a defferment of 2 payments in XX/XX/XXXX and payed {$230.00}. In XX/XX/XXXX, my account was 2 months behind and a rep contacted me and informed me that a little over {$1000.00} was due. He said I could resolve by doing the differment and paying {$230.00}. He indicated my account would be current. However, XXXX informed me today that those actions did not bring my account current and that {$1000.00} was due in XXXX. I have spoken with a representative of regional each month and I was not informed of this delinquent balance or this other running balance of interest until XX/XX/XXXX when I spoke to XXXX. Also, the rep I spoke with in XX/XX/XXXX used the phrase 'this will bring your account current ''. this lead me to believe the account was update and there was not a balance due at that time. however, XXXX indicates today that was not correct. Also, when I spoke with a representative on XX/XX/XXXX and paid {$450.00}, the representative did not indicate I have a {$1900.00} balance. However, XXXX informed me today, that was the amount that was due at that time. Representatives have been misleading and/ or untruthful or was not well versed in the information they were providing. also, I have not been provided statements so I can monitor balance. Should n't the representative be honest with me about my account and the balances and the amounts due. I believe they have a fiduciary responsibility to do so and to provide me with visual statements for my account. Please assist in this matter as I have been mi-slead for an entire year about my account and balances. also, my payments are not being applied to the interest, principal, late fees, or returned check fees but rather something else. I also spoke to a supervisor in collections named XXXX whose only suggestions was that I can create an online account for statements.

product: Mortgage
consumer complaint narrative:
I applied for a mortgage forbearance with XXXX XXXX effective XX/XX/XXXX I opted to extend it for a year total. 
I opted for a Loan Modification, it took time for them to send the paperwork and schedule a notary, modification was official in XX/XX/XXXX and XXXX XXXX told me to make payments while it was being processed. I made payments for XX/XX/XXXX, XX/XX/XXXX, and XX/XX/XXXX. During this time the modification was not officially implemented. I called every month to check in with everything and make my payments. I made the exact payment they told me to make over the phone. 

In XX/XX/XXXX I receive notification my loan is being sold to Lakeview XXXX XXXX. Lakeview XXXX XXXX tells me I need to make payments while the paperwork is processed. I call 1-3 times a month checking on it and making the monthly payments they told me to make. The modification is not processed until XX/XX/XXXX. I made every monthly payment during this time. I called every month to escalate getting my modification processed. 

In XX/XX/XXXX Lakeview XXXX XXXX says I owe an overdue balance of {$3000.00}. I call and tell them this must be an error because I have made every monthly payment. I called twice a month from XXXX - XXXX. They said they were working on the error and escalating the issue. I make every monthly payment during this time. 

Then in XX/XX/XXXX they report me as delinquent to the credit agencies and this destroys my credit. It was above 800 and now is around 650. I call again and again and they said they can't tell me what they issue is and are continuing to escalate the issue. I had a few times where they promised to call me back when they had more info, and they never did. I keep calling and making my monthly payment and asking on more info on the issue. 

I call again in early XXXX to push the situation further because my credit score still shows as delinquent, even though I am making every monthly payment. I reach someone in the customer service department that researches these sorts of things. They tell me that XXXX XXXX applied 2 payments I made at the end of XXXX into " unapplied funds '' instead of applying it to a payment. This is the first time I have ever heard of " unapplied funds '', when I made the payments with XXXX XXXX over the phone they said it was being applied to the payments. So those came over to Lakeview XXXX XXXX as unpaid months. He tells me there is nothing that can be done to correct this and I have to pay the overdue balance to make my account current. I empty my savings to pay this overdue balance as I want it corrected with the credit agencies. I now think this nightmare is over. 

Then I receive a letter XX/XX/XXXX from Lakeview XXXX XXXX that my account is past due. I check online and the entire loan modification has been reverted back to the old interest rate and with around {$20000.00} due. I call Lakeview XXXX XXXX immediately. They tell me there was an error with my modification but can not tell me what the error is. They said they need to reach out to XXXX XXXX and re-do the whole modification. I push them that this needs to be resolved. I ask about the {$3000.00} XXXX paid in XXXX, that was on top of my monthly payment that I also paid, and they said that will be put in " unapplied funds '' and put towards the principal. At this point I am absolutely furious. I emptied my savings to pay this to get my account corrected and credit score corrected. I tell them that they MUST apply this to either future payments or refund the amount. They note that is my account but say they can not guarantee it. They say I shouldn't make my XX/XX/XXXX payment as it will likely end up in " unapplied funds ''. And that I need to wait. But they have been telling me this for 8 months, they tell me over and over that it will be processed in 10 days but it's been months at this point. 

This has been 8 months of XXXX, and almost a year if you count in XXXX XXXX as well. I signed my modification and have made every single payment to both companies. I even paid the $ XXXX overdue balance that wasn't an actual overdue balance.

consumer complaint narrative: I XXXX XXXX and my husband XXXX request through the Consumer Financial Protection Bureau a motion for my mortgage servicing company Select Portfolio Servicing , Inc. to cease and desist all calls to our home or cell phones about missed mortgage payments. SPS should submit our cease and desist request and abide by the rules, and assign a mortgage workout specialist to notify us on how to start the forbearance/modification process. Therefore, our request should cease any threats of a foreclosure process, as we will file for bankruptcy if necessary.

The records I am questioning connect with no exchanges acquiring any possession of goods, services or money that I have made or authorized. Assuming no one cares either way, block the noteworthy of any information in my credit record that came about due to an alleged fraud or extortion. 

XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX Date Opened : XX/XX/ Balance : {$0.00}. Im attaching the required FTC Report for you ( which complies with FCRA Section 603 ( q ) ( 4 ) which states ( 4 ) The term " identity theft report '' has the meaning given that term by rule of the Bureau, and means, at a minimum, a report ( A ) that alleges an identity theft ; ) ( B ) that is a copy of an official, valid report filed by a consumer with an appropriate Federal, State, or local law enforcement agency, including the United States Postal Inspection Service, or such other government agency deemed appropriate by the Bureau ; and ( C ) the filing of which subjects the person filing the report to criminal penalties relating to the filing of false information if, in fact, the information in the report is false. ) The following report included this language but Experian is neglecting to process it to the letter of the law. Please see they are held accountable for as this is impacting my life in emotional, physical & financially... and I would truly not what to pursue a legal remedy ... and the bank 's records ( learned through more research both parties require ). If you do not provide any records & claim the item is verified please understand I will seek legal action. I do not take kindly to games nor does my attorney. consumer complaint narrative: On XX/XX/2022 I notice there was serval errors on my credit report with XXXX, Equifax and XXXX. product: Credit reporting, credit repair services, or other personal consumer reports
consumer complaint narrative:
I recieved a loan consolidation advertisement from XXXX XXXX XXXX thru the us mail. When I called it turned out to be fredon debt relief. The salesmen took my info and told me that I should stop making payments to the cc companies and instead make monthly payments to a dedicated account. He assured me that fdr would negotiate with the cc companies and I would be debt free XX/XX/2019. I was told that a lawyer was not necessary but if needed I should use XXXX I like an XXXX drank the cool aid. 

After two of the cc companies were in settlement the third filed a court case against me. When I contacted fdr I was put in contact with a lawyer from XXXX   who informed me that I would need to make two balloon payments of {$5000.00} and increase my monthly dedicated account payments by over 50 % for the next 20 months. From what I can tell from their dashboard the reason for the increase in deposits was to pay their fees. 

When I objected to these terms with a XXXX lawyer I was told to contact fdr. When I contacted fdr I was told to contact XXXX. One of the XXXX lawyers even told me that due to the size of the debt the bank involved will not negotiate with fdr. The lawyer  for the bank even called me and said I would need a lawyer. 

The lawyer for XXXX told me that I needed to sign an agreement, that my only other option was bankruptcy. When I offered to pay at once instead of a structured settlement I was told I would be paying the same amount. I was never made aware of the ramifications associated with signing. 

I ran into money problems in XX/XX/2019 and was not able to make the second to last payment of the agreement on time. In XX/XX/2019 I contacted XXXX and a lawyer told me I should contact fdr. When I contacted fdr I was under the impression that it would not be a problem. At no time was I told that missing the payment would void the agreement nor was I given any other options on paying. 

When I called an XXXX lawyer for clarity on the matter he told me to contact fdr and laughed at my perdicement. I am being told that the payment plan was voided after the XXXX payment was skipped yet payments for XXXX & XXXX were processed. The XXXX payment was skipped by fdr so they could collect the last of their fees leaving the account short funds to make the final payment to settle the account. w Every time I emailed fdr on this matter I was pretty much told to call their 800 # to speak to a representative.Unfortunitly thats what got me in trouble in the first place. When I ask about what they have done to settle the account I get no answer. When I ask if they contacted the creditor in XX/XX/2019 concerning a late payment I get no answer. When I ask why I was not alerted to the fact that they were going to collect their fees instead of paying my creditor I get no answerXXXX

consumer complaint narrative:
I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing to formally dispute the accuracy of the late payment information that is currently present on my credit report. I have thoroughly reviewed my credit report and identified discrepancies related to late payments that I believe are inaccurately reported. I kindly request your immediate attention to this matter in order to rectify the inaccuracies on my credit report. 
XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX XXXX  I am aware of the importance of an accurate credit report and understand the impact it has on my overall creditworthiness. After careful review of my payment history with the aforementioned creditor, I have identified that the reported late payments are not reflective of my actual payment history. 
I am kindly requesting the removal or correction of the inaccurately reported late payments on my credit report. In accordance with the Fair Credit Reporting Act ( FCRA ), I am entitled to a fair and accurate credit report. I request that you conduct a thorough investigation into this matter and, if necessary, contact the creditor to verify the accuracy of the reported information. 
I kindly ask that you investigate and resolve this dispute as soon as possible, preferably within the 30-day timeframe mandated by the FCRA. Your prompt attention to this matter is crucial to ensuring the accuracy of my credit report.
